post_text:
Everyone talks about HR not getting back to you.

But no one talks about those relatives who took our resumes and CVs saying "Tu tension mat le, main baat karta hun kisi se." and then never showed up ever again. 🥲

Colleague - You are exhausted, Smriti. It’s ok. Weekend pe rest kar lena.

Me - Weekend pe rest?? HehehHAHAHHA! The way life has been going, I need to hibernate for at least 6 months straight! 😀👍

To all these quick commerce brands, (To be specific, Everyday, Zepto Café, etc.)

I know you guys are trying to make our lives as convenient as possible by offering services that, tbh, leave us partially(totally) disappointed.

Yaar dekho, ek real incident share karti hun...
Do Swiggy employees ever order from Zomato and deliberately give bad ratings, and vice versa? 😀

Just when I think people from Bangalore can't surprise me anymore, someone walks in and does something beyond my wildest imagination!

So, this one guy delivered himself to his office using PORTER??? because he couldn't find a cab on Ola or Uber!!!?????? AYYOOOOOOO!!!!

Just Bangalore things!!! T_T
Resume ka ATS-Friendly hona is as important as shahi paneer mein paneer ka hona. 🙂👍
Either you're a chill manager, or you're an all-the-time "chillane wala" manager. There's no middle ground. 🙂👍
It takes a special kind of person to type "Please find attached" and then forget to attach the file. That person is me. EVERY. SINGLE. TIME! 🤡

Nahin Sir!

You can’t give me a task at 5:30 and expect it to be done by EOD.

I SWEAR I’LL CRY!!

What a scam!

Pura hafta weekend ka wait karo aur yeh weekend do second bhi nahin tikta. 😡

Dear Boss,

I don’t know if you believe in this or not but employees ki productivity appreciation se badhti hai, naa ki criticism se.

Thanks and regards 👺🎀
Office mein, the one with a MacBook has way less work than the one with a Dell or ThinkPad.

See,

No matter how much I rant on LinkedIn about my corporate life, deep down, I am forever grateful to God and my parents for making me capable enough to secure a job in the corporate sector. I’m thankful for everything that worked in my favor and for the people who gave me experiences worth sharing on this platform—experiences that often make others wonder what’s wrong with my brain.

Yeh haseen waadiyaan, yeh khula aasmaan

Yet, you all decided to create official WhatsApp groups just to send unnecessary meeting invites and messages that look like emails! 😡

Words that I swear by

Your personal life should remain private and unknown to anyone in the office. What you do after office hours, who you meet, where you go, when your next vacation is planned, who you’re dating, or what you’re planning for the weekend—everything should be kept to yourself.

You never know who might be plotting against you.

As they say, "Prevention is better than cure."
